<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stalwart Standard](/Feats.aspx?ID=3620) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 81</row>

**Archetypes** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53), [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier's Banner](/Feats.aspx?ID=1920); [Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

Your banner makes it harder for your foes to push your allies around and encourages your allies to protect the innocent. Allies benefiting from your Cavalier's Banner feat also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40). Each benefited ally also gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against any creature that has dealt damage to an innocent of a lower level than that ally within the last round; [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) creatures, companions, or any creatures you or your allies put into danger on purpose to attempt to gain this bonus don't count.
